entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shelburne Sandy Point 05:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -17.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Light snow beginning this afternoon. High minus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 20 cm except 10 cm inland. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
